SENT.plain: INTRODUCTION: Neuropsychiatric symptoms in systemic mastocytosis are usually cognitive and affective changes
EXEGESIS: We describe here two systemic mastocytosis patients without eosinophilia presenting strokes associated with cervical artery dissection
CONCLUSION: These observations are the first reported and they suggest that systemic mastocytosis could be add to the predisposing factors of spontaneous cervical artery dissections
